property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +3 STR while defending during a challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Response: after you win dominance, kneel attached character to put the top card of your discard pile on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to have Greatjon Umber participate in the current (military) or (power) challenge as either attacker or defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Rickard Karstark gets +1 STR for each duplicate attached to him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a (military) challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Robb Stark.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to give an attacking character -3 STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ser Edmure Tully is defending, you win if the total STR of both players is tied when the challenge resolves.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: House Manderly Knight gets +2 STR while participating in a challenge with at least one other (Stark) character.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Mormont Knight gets +1 STR when participating in a challenge with at least one other (Stark) character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a (military) challenge by 4 or more total STR, claim 1 power for your House (limit once per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your (Stark) characters gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a (power) challenge, discard the top 2 cards of your deck to give each attacking character -1 STR for the duration of the challenge (limit once per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a (military) challenge, discard the top 2 cards of your deck to give each attacking character -1 STR for the duration of the challenge (limit twice per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during an (intrigue) challenge, discard the top 2 cards of your deck to give each attacking character -1 STR for the duration of the challenge (limit twice per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: discard the top card of your deck to give attached character -1 STR until the end of the phase. Limit 3 times per phase

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play Powerless during the marshalling phase, draw a card. Attached character's STR does not count during the dominance phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Power on attached character does not count towards its controller's victory total.

property.name: Text
property.value: May not be played if Widow's Wail is already in play. Attached character gets+1 STR. If attached character is Joffrey Baratheon, he gets an additional +1 STR for each power on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: when a character kneels to use an ability, kneel Cersei to cancel the effect of that ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after an opponent discards a card from his or her hand, Janos Slynt claims 1 power (limit once per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Kevan Lannister gains a (power) icon while you control at least one other Lord character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win an (intrigue) challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Ser Lancel Lannister.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to choose a character. Add or remove an (intrigue) icon from that character until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to lower the printed cost of the next attachment you play this phase to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win an (intrigue) challenge in which Queen's Spies participates as a defender, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: After played, choose and discard an Ally character from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win an (intrigue) challenge by 4 or more total STR, claim 1 power for your House (limit once per challenge).

property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after a knelt character stands during the stading phase, kneel Lannisport Brothel to kneel that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to place a character with an (intrigue) icon from your discard pile on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord or Lady only. Limit 1 per Character. Response: after you reveal a plot card, attached character claims 1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stannis Baratheon only. May not be played if Lightbringer is already in play. Response: kneel Lightbringer to save Stannis Baratheon from being killed

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets -1 STR. Discard attached character from play if his STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: discard the top card from your deck to have Edric Storm get +1 STR until the end of the phase (limit twice per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to choose a location. Discard that location from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: discard the top 2 cards of your deck to move 1 power from any character in play to Selyse Baratheon (limit once per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a (power) challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Ser Axel Florent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: discard the top 2 cards from your deck to choose a character. Discard 1 power on that character (limit once per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Stannis Baratheon gets +1 STR for each power on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: [+1 INITIATIVE]

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the dominance phase, stand Envoy of Dragonstone.

property.name: Text
property.value: [+4 INITIATIVE]

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a (power) challenge by 4 or more total STR, claim 1 power for your House (limit once per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: before plot cards are revealed, name a plot card. For each opponent that reveals the named plot card, claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard from play at any time you do not control at least one (Baratheon) character. Response: after you win a (military) challenge, kneel to discard the top 2 cards from the losing player's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: No character with power on it may be chosen as the only target of an event card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discard from play at any time you do not control at least one (Baratheon) character. Any phase: kneel to choose and stand a (Baratheon) character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-unique location. Take control of attached location and all attachments on that location. You lose control of attached location if Conquer leaves play.

property.name: Text
property.value: (Greyjoy) character only. Attached character gets +1 STR for each attachment on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and discard the top 2 cards from your deck to look at an opponent's hand. Choose and discard an event card in his or her hand, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: discard the top card from your deck to give Asha Greyjoy an (intrigue) or (power) icon until the end of the phase. Limit twice per phase

property.name: Text
property.value: While Balon Greyjoy is attacking, defending characters lose the renown keyword.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attacking, defending characters get -1 STR for each Warship you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Euron Greyjoy is standing, all (Greyjoy) characters get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to put a (Greyjoy) character with cost 2 or lower from your hand into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after Theon Greyjoy is declared as an attacker, kneel all locations controlled by the defending player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you reveal a plot card, Victarion Greyjoy claims 1 power if you control at least 2 Warship locations (limit once per round).

property.name: Text
property.value: Drowned Men may not attack if you do not control more (Greyjoy) locations than any other player.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.value: No attachments,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: kneel and discard the top 2 cards from your deck to save a location from being discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Loosters from your hand, each opponent discards the top 2 cards of his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Oarsman gets +2 STR if you control at least one Warship location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: discard the top card from your deck to give Priest of the Drowned God +1 STR for the duration of the challenge (limit twice per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to stand a Warship location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel to give a participating (Greyjoy) character +2 STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship you control if you do not control a (Greyjoy) character. Challenges: during a (military) challenge, kneel to have Longship 'Black Wind' add +2 to your total STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship you control if you do not control a (Greyjoy) character. Challenges: during a (power) challenge, kneel to have Longship 'Great Kraken' add +2 to your total STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship you control if you do not control a (Greyjoy) character. Challenges: during a challenge, kneel to have Longship 'Iron Victory' add +2 to your total STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of Marshalling phase, kneel each Warship you control if you do not control a (Greyjoy) character. Challenges: during an (intrigue) challenge, kneel to have Longship 'Silence' add +2 to your total STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next (Greyjoy) card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lord or Lady only. Limit 1 per character. Response: discard Bodyguard from play to save attached character from being killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Maester only. Response: discard the top 2 cards of your deck to save attached character from being killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the dominance phase, Knight of Flowers claims 1 power if standing.

property.value: At the beginning of the dominance phase, stand each Kingsguard character.

property.value: Response: choose and discard an attachment card from your hand to save a Lord or Lady character from being killed.

property.value: Ser Meryn Trant gains the renown keyword while attacking or defending with another Kingsguard character.

property.value: During the dominance phase,each Kingsguard characters get +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel and discard an event card from your hand to take a unique character from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gunthor son of Gurn may defend against any type of challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: kneel to stand a location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: give one power from your House to an opponent's House to double Bloody Mummers' STR for the duration of the challenge. (Limit one per challenge).

property.value: Burned Men get +4 STR while attacking.

property.value: Marshalling: kneel to choose and kill a character with STR 1 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingswood Bandit gains the stealth keyword if there is at least one Kingsroad in play.

property.value: Response: after an opponent plays an event card, stand Stone Crows.

property.value: Sworn Brother may participate in (military) or (power) challenges while there is a Creature in play.

property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to ignore all gold cost penalties of the next character you play this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: The cost for you to play Clansman characters is lowered by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing,-,-

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel to put the top 2 cards of your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Army characters do not kneel to attack or defend during (military) challenges.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel 3 of your (Greyjoy) characters to choose a House. Choose and kneel up to 3 characters from that House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: during a (military) challenge, choose one of your participating (Greyjoy) characters. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR where X is equal to that character’s printed STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: choose a Lord or Lady character. Move 1 power from that character to any (Baratheon) character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: treat all characters in play as though their text boxes were blank for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose an attacking (Lannister) character. That character gets +1 STR for each location you control for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose one of your (Lannister) characters with STR 3 or higher to gain the stealth keyword until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel one of your characters with a (military) icon to add +2 to your total STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a participating (Baratheon) character. That character gets +2 STR and gains the renown keyword for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: kneel one of your characters with an (intrigue) icon to choose an attacking character. That character's printed STR is reduced to 0 for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: choose two characters. Move any number of non-unique Weapon, Item or Title attachments from one of the chosen characters to the other. Any attachments which can not be legally attached are discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win dominance, kneel 2 of your (Stark) characters to have them claim 1 power each.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel 2 of your (Greyjoy) characters to choose and kneel a Lord character. That character claims 2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: choose a defending (Stark) character. That character gets +4 STR for the duration of the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your (Baratheon) characters to force an opponent to reveal a new plot card. If the newly revealed plot card has a lower income than yours, claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a (military) challenge by 4 or more total STR. Kill all participating characters on the losing side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your Knight characters to search your deck for a Knight characters, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your (Greyjoy) characters to discard the top X cards from an opponent's deck. X is the printed STR of the character knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your (Stark) characters to choose and shuffle 3 cards from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: House Greyjoy only. Any phase: each non-(Greyjoy) character in play gets -1 STR until the end of the phase. (Limit one per phase).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: save a (Greyjoy) character from being killed. Then attach this card to the saved character (counts as a Condition attachment) with the text 'attached character gets +1 STR.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Take any duplicates of unique characters you control into your hand, then discard the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a (power) challenge by 4 or more total STR. Claim 2 power for your House. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a (intrigue) challenge by 4 or more total STR. The losing opponent must choose and discard two cards from his or her hand. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: play after you win a (military) challenge by 4 or more total STR. Stand all of your participating characters. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: stand a (Greyjoy) location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: discard the top X cards from your deck to give a participating (Lannister) character +X STR for the duration of the challenge. X may not be greater than 6.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel three of your (Greyjoy) characters to discard all locations from play (cannot be saved)

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: kneel one of your characters with a (power) icon to lower the printed cost of the next location you play this phase to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: each of your attacking (Greyjoy) characters gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge. Limit 1 per challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: The income of each opponent's revealed Plot card is reduced to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a location card you do not have in play, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a Maester character with cost 3 or less and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control fewer charcters than any opponent, each character you control gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only House Grejoy may reveal this plot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters with STR 2 or lower do not stand during the standing phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters cost an additional 2 gold to play this round. This is considered to be a gold penalty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character gets +1 STR for each attachment on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only House Baratheon may reveal this plot. When revelaed, each player chooses a unique character from his or her dead pile, if able. Return all chosen characters to play, knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per plot deck. When revealed, kill all characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Round Sequence 1. Plot 2. Draw 3. Marshalling 4. Challenges 5. Dominance 6. Stand
